thread.title: Confused Mark Cuban called out Clickhole like it was a legit news site
thread.title_full: Confused Mark Cuban called out Clickhole like it was a legit news site

author: Christina Careaga
title: Confused Mark Cuban called out Clickhole like it was a legit news site
text:
File this under: 'Lol Mark Cuban , what?'
On Tuesday, the " serial entrepreneur " (lol) and owner of the Dallas Mavericks apparently confused Clickhole - the internet's favorite satirical website mocking clickbait articles - for a real news site.
SEE ALSO: Will Arnett prank calling a toy store as Lego Batman is so damn funny
As part of their "They said what?!" series where the website posts ridiculous made-up Quote: s from famous faces, Clickhole attributed this parody Quote: to the Sharktank "Shark":
Mark Cuban said WHAT?! https://t.co/sQK9CoHXO7 pic.twitter.com/XjSv5k23JV
— ClickHole (@ClickHole) March 21, 2017
Cuban, completely falling for it, quickly tweeted and deleted this response:
Well, @ClickHole briefly fooled @mcuban : pic.twitter.com/Dx6hMu7GL6
— Jeryl Bier (@JerylBier) March 21, 2017
"I love libraries." Thank God he clarified.
Clickhole: 1 Cuban: -100,000.
WATCH: Why this comedian can't stop doing stand-up
